thread.section_title: Suntransfers.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Suntransfers.com | suntransfers.com
thread.title: Jaye Lincoln

author: Jaye Lincoln
title: Jaye Lincoln
text:
I had a transfer from DPS - my accomodation in Seminyak this month.
The service was friendly, however pressuring to puchase other tours with the company from one of the members who met us at the airport which was a little overwhelming after an 11 hour flight! Transport was in reasonable condition and the driver knew exactly where our accomodation was so that was helpful.
I would recommend to and from the airport transfers as these are a good price and makes things hassle-free.
